TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WorkbookEvents_SheetPivotTableChangeSyncEventHandler(object Sh, PivotTable Target);
.class public auto ansi sealed WorkbookEvents_SheetPivotTableChangeSyncEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WorkbookEvents_SheetPivotTableChangeSyncEventHandler(Sh As Object, Target As PivotTable)
public delegate void WorkbookEvents_SheetPivotTableChangeSyncEventHandler(System::Object ^ Sh, PivotTable ^ Target);

Docs.param: The worksheet that contains the PivotTable.
Docs.summary: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event. The SheetPivotTableChangeSync event occurs after changes to a PivotTable.
